text: The Asia/Oceania Zone is one of the three zones of regional Davis Cup competition in 2014. In the Asia/Oceania Zone there are four different groups in which teams compete against each other to advance to the next group. ==Teams== http://www.daviscup.com/en/draws-results/group-iv/asia- oceania/2014.aspx ===Group A=== * * * * * ===Group B=== * * * (promoted to group III) * (promoted to group III) * ==Format== The ten teams were split into two round robin pools of five, with the winning nation from each pool playing against the runner-up from the other pool in promotion play-off matches. The winning teams from these matches were promoted to Group III in 2015. The ties were played on the week commencing 9 June 2014 at Tehran, Iran and were played on outdoor clay courts. ==Groups== ===Group A=== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=175|Team !width=50|Ties Played !width=50|Ties Won !width=50|Ties Lost !width=50|Matches Won !width=50|Matches Lost !width=50|Standing |- |style="text- align:left"|||4||4||0||10||2||1 |- |style="text-align:left" |||4||3||1||8||4||2 |- |style="text-align:left"|||4||2||2||7||5||3 |- |style="text-align:left"|||4||1||3||5||7||4 |- |style="text- align:left"|||4||0||4||0||12||5 |} ====Pacific Oceania vs. Kyrgyzstan==== ====Jordan vs. Bangladesh==== ====Pacific Oceania vs. Bangladesh==== ====Jordan vs. Iraq==== ====Pacific Oceania vs. Jordan==== ====Iraq vs. Kyrgyzstan==== ====Pacific Oceania vs. Iraq==== ====Bangladesh vs. Kyrgyzstan==== ====Jordan vs. Kyrgyzstan==== ====Bangladesh vs. Iraq==== ===Group B=== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=175|Team !width=50|Ties Played !width=50|Ties Won !width=50|Ties Lost !width=50|Matches Won !width=50|Matches Lost !width=50|Standing |- |style="text- align:left"|||4||4||0||9||3||1 |- |style="text-align:left" |||4||3||1||10||2||2 |- |style="text-align:left"|||4||2||2||6||6||3 |- |style="text-align:left"|||4||1||3||5||7||4 |- |style="text- align:left"|||4||0||4||0||12||5 |} ====Qatar vs. Mongolia==== ====Saudi Arabia vs. Oman==== ====Qatar vs. Oman==== ====Saudi Arabia vs. Bahrain==== ====Qatar vs. Saudi Arabia==== ====Bahrain vs. Mongolia==== ====Qatar vs. Bahrain==== ====Oman vs. Mongolia==== ====Saudi Arabia vs. Mongolia==== ====Oman vs. Bahrain==== ==Play-offs== ===1st to 4th Play-off=== ====Pacific Oceania vs. Qatar==== ====Jordan vs. Saudi Arabia==== ===5th to 6th Play- off=== ====Bangladesh vs. Mongolia==== ===7th to 8th Play-off=== ====Iraq vs. Bahrain==== ===9th to 10th Play-off=== ====Kyrgyzstan vs. Oman==== ==References== ==External links== *Official Website Asia Oceania Zone IV Category:Davis Cup Asia/Oceania Zone
